about_the_game:
City of Cats is a cat-simulated urban strategy RPG developed by Fansugar Games, in which “emotions” have become a kind of visual substance, and the mysterious Cat Clan has transformed “emotions” into new energies, substances, and even “emotional arms” that can be used in combat. The mysterious Cat Clan has transformed emotions into new energies, substances, and even combat-ready “Emotional Arms”. As an investigator, you lead a team of Cats to investigate the truth behind the large number of emotional illnesses in the city. ......

A future city with emotions running rampant and a foggy undercurrent.

Near-future technological city, 3D next-generation cartoon rendering, light cyber storm is coming.

Mysterious cat family, armed attack, explore the secrets behind the mutation!

Hidden in the city, the cat race, form switching to resist the mob, 3D cool moves interpretation.

Flexible decks, unique battles, strategizing and collaborative combat

Free combination of skill cards, combined strategic operation, breaking the possibility of a single gameplay.

Chatting with cats, sucking cats online, soothing anxious and violent emotions.

Cloud cat, and cat to spend leisure daily, feel the accompanying healing emotional energy.

content_descriptors.notes: Some of the fashions in the game are configured with exclusive scenarios, where clicking on different locations can trigger the character's reaction.

detailed_description:
City of Cats is a cat-simulated urban strategy RPG developed by Fansugar Games, in which “emotions” have become a kind of visual substance, and the mysterious Cat Clan has transformed “emotions” into new energies, substances, and even “emotional arms” that can be used in combat. The mysterious Cat Clan has transformed emotions into new energies, substances, and even combat-ready “Emotional Arms”. As an investigator, you lead a team of Cats to investigate the truth behind the large number of emotional illnesses in the city. ......

name: Cat Fantasy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 3050 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Cats embody justice, emotions wield power! Hello Investigator, welcome to Cat Fantasy, where you and your feline partners handle emotional events and unravel the mysteries behind them together!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
